name: Romain Athus, MD
title: Vice President of Medical Affairs
shortBio: Organize medications for mission trips, create liaisons with local hospitals, educate local Haitian citizens about preventive health care.  Provide long-term medications to assist patients with chronic diseases.  Long term vision for Haiti is to someday build local clinics in Haiti, continue active medical education, increase awareness regarding complications of chronic diseases, assist local hospitals with their resources.
